domain_model.plantuml:
@startuml

class Facility {
  +name: String
  +location: String
  +operationalHours: String
  +structuralIntegrity: float
  +transportStatus: enum
  +windResistance: int
  +temperatureRange: Range
  +roofLoadCapacity: int
  +startOperations()
  +scheduleMaintenance()
  +checkCompliance(): ComplianceReport
  +notifyOccupants(message: String, urgency: UrgencyLevel)
  +generateEnergyReport(): EnergyReport
}

class WaterSystem {
  +potableWaterQuality: WaterQuality
  +phLevel: double
  +purifyWater()
  +monitorWaterQuality(): WaterQuality
  +displayPhLevel()
  +alertMaintenance()
}

class WaterStorage {
  +potableWaterCapacity: double
  +greyWaterCapacity: double
  +blackWaterCapacity: double
  +waterTypes: String
  +storeWater()
  +checkContaminationLevels(): ContaminationReport
}

class WaterFilter {
  +filterStatus: FilterStatus
  +lastMaintenanceDate: Date
  +checkFilterStatus(): FilterStatus
}

class HVACSystem {
  +currentTemperature: double
  +targetTemperature: double
  +systemStatus: enum
  +adjustTemperature(newTemp: double)
  +performSelfTest(): TestResult
}

class WasteManagementSystem {
  +disposalMethod: String
  +weatherResilient: Boolean
  +currentCapacity: double
  +processWaste(wasteType: WasteType)
}

class StorageSystem {
  +capacity: double
  +currentUtilization: double
}

class FoodStorage {
  +refrigerationCapacity: double
  +freezerCapacity: double
  +foodSupplyWeight: double
  +storeFood()
  +monitorTemperature(): TemperatureStatus
}

class EquipmentStorage {
  +storageCapacity: double
  +environmentalControls: Boolean
  +equipmentType: EquipmentType
  +storeEquipment()
  +trackInventory(): InventoryReport
}

class IceCoreStorage {
  +temperatureRange: Range
  +iceCoreCapacity: int
  +storeIceCore()
  +maintainTemperature(minTemp: double, maxTemp: double)
}

class CommunicationSystem {
  +radioBackup: Boolean
  +videoConferencing: Boolean
  +computerCount: Number
  +connectionSpeed: float
  +encryptionStatus: Boolean
  +downloadSpeed: double
  +uploadSpeed: double
  +transmitData()
  +establishEncryptedComm()
  +establishConnection(destination: String): boolean
  +encryptCommunication(data: Data): EncryptedData
  +establishVideoConference(participants: List<String>): ConferenceSession
}

class Radio {
  +powerSource: PowerSource
  +switchToBatteryBackup()
  +useSolarPower()
}

class NetworkSystem {
  +wifiSpeed: double
  +monitorNetworkPerformance(): NetworkReport
}

class Computer {
  +type: ComputerType
  +transmitData(data: Data, destination: String): TransmissionStatus
}

class DataStorage {
  +encryptionStatus: boolean
  +storeData(data: Data): StorageStatus
  +retrieveData(identifier: String): Data
}

class CloudStorage {
  +accessUrl: String
  +synchronizeData(): SyncStatus
}

class ControlSystem {
  +isPasswordProtected: Boolean
  +accessMethod: String
  +accessDevice: DeviceType
  +triggerAlert()
  +runBuiltInTest()
  +performManualUpdate()
  +executeCommand(command: Command): CommandResult
}

class Sensor {
  +sensorType: String
  +updateInterval: String
  +performTest()
}

class EnergyManagementSystem {
  +currentConsumption: double
  +dailyReport: String
  +generateDailyReport(): String
}

class LivingQuarters {
  +bedCount: int
  +mobileCotCount: int
  +showerCount: int
  +toiletCount: int
  +sinkCount: int
  +laundryFacility: Boolean
  +accommodateOccupants()
  +performLaundry()
}

class BathroomFacilities {
  +showerCount: int
  +toiletCount: int
  +sinkCount: int
}

class LaundryFacilities {
  +washerCount: int
  +dryerCount: int
}

class SafetySystem {
  +firstAidKits: int
  +aedUnits: int
  +exerciseSpace: int
  +eatingArea: int
  +alertEmergency()
}

class ResearchTeam {
  +teamName: String
  +cloudStorageUrl: String
  +accessCloudData()
  +interfaceWithRadio()
}

class MonitoringSystem {
  +lastTestTime: DateTime
  +alertStatus: enum
  +monitoredSystems: List<SystemType>
  +runSystemTest(): TestReport
  +sendAlert(message: String)
  +scheduleTest(systemType: SystemType, interval: int)
}

class SecuritySystem {
  +accessLevel: AccessLevel
  +authenticateUser(username: String, password: String): AuthenticationResult
}

class FireSuppressionSystem {
  +status: SystemStatus
  +activate()
  +performSelfTest(): TestResult
}

class MedicalEquipment {
  +type: MedicalEquipmentType
  +lastRestockDate: Date
  +checkSupplyStatus(): SupplyStatus
}

class CommonArea {
  +type: AreaType
  +squareFootage: double
}

class KitchenEquipment {
  +type: KitchenEquipmentType
}

class FuelStorage {
  +currentCapacity: double
  +checkCompliance(): ComplianceStatus
}

// Relationships
Facility *-- WaterSystem : "contains"
WaterSystem *-- WaterStorage : "contains"
WaterSystem *-- WaterFilter : "includes"
Facility *-- HVACSystem : "contains"
Facility *-- WasteManagementSystem : "contains"
Facility *-- StorageSystem : "contains 1..*"
StorageSystem <|-- FoodStorage : "inherits"
StorageSystem <|-- EquipmentStorage : "inherits"
StorageSystem <|-- IceCoreStorage : "inherits"
Facility *-- CommunicationSystem : "contains"
CommunicationSystem *-- Radio : "includes"
CommunicationSystem *-- Computer : "includes"
CommunicationSystem *-- NetworkSystem : "includes"
CommunicationSystem *-- DataStorage : "includes"
DataStorage --> CloudStorage : "connects"
Facility *-- ControlSystem : "contains"
ControlSystem o-- Sensor : "aggregates"
Facility *-- EnergyManagementSystem : "contains"
Facility *-- LivingQuarters : "contains"
LivingQuarters *-- BathroomFacilities : "includes"
LivingQuarters *-- LaundryFacilities : "includes"
Facility *-- SafetySystem : "contains"
CommunicationSystem --> ResearchTeam : "interfaces with"
Facility *-- MonitoringSystem : "contains"
Facility *-- SecuritySystem : "contains"
Facility *-- FireSuppressionSystem : "contains"
Facility *-- MedicalEquipment : "contains 1..*"
Facility *-- CommonArea : "contains 1..*"
Facility *-- KitchenEquipment : "contains 1..*"
Facility *-- FuelStorage : "contains"
MonitoringSystem --> HVACSystem : "monitors"
MonitoringSystem --> WaterSystem : "monitors"
MonitoringSystem --> WasteManagementSystem : "monitors"
MonitoringSystem --> FireSuppressionSystem : "monitors"
ControlSystem --> HVACSystem : "controls"
ControlSystem --> WaterSystem : "controls"

@enduml

requirement_issues.requirement_text: Provide water for drinking and hygiene. The facility shall have a water purification system sufficient for both drinking and cooking, as well as for bathing, laundry, and restroom usage.

issues.description: The requirement uses the term 'water purification system' which conflicts with domain model terminology that divides water processing into the WaterSystem, WaterStorage, and WaterFilter components.
issues.suggested_fix: Clarify whether the term should refer to the overall water subsystem or specific components, and standardize the terminology.

issues.description: The term 'water purification system' may be misinterpreted as being equivalent to the 'water recycling subsystem' used elsewhere in the requirements.
issues.suggested_fix: Clarify and standardize the terminology across all water-related requirements to match the domain model.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The water recycling subsystem shall filter water in accordance with safety water standards defined by regulatory bodies.

issues.description: No specific regulatory bodies or standards are mentioned, making it impossible to verify compliance.
issues.suggested_fix: Specify the applicable regulatory bodies (e.g., EPA, WHO) and reference the exact water safety standards.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The water recycling subsystem shall include a monitoring device that alerts the LSF when the filtering system requires change or maintenance, with data retrieved via a dedicated application.

issues.description: The abbreviation 'LSF' is not defined and may lead to confusion.
issues.suggested_fix: Replace 'LSF' with a clearly defined term such as 'Facility' to ensure consistency.

issues.description: The term 'water recycling subsystem' is not aligned with the domain model terminology.
issues.suggested_fix: Adopt domain model terms, such as 'WaterSystem' or 'WaterFilter', to describe this functionality.

issues.description: The requirement calls for a dedicated application for data retrieval, but such an application is not represented in the domain model.
issues.suggested_fix: Extend the model to include components (e.g., within ControlSystem or Computer) that support a monitoring application.

issues.description: The domain model currently lacks a maintenance alert attribute or mechanism in the WaterFilter component.
issues.suggested_fix: Add a 'maintenanceAlert' attribute to WaterFilter or introduce a dedicated MonitoringDevice class linked to it.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The water storage subsystem shall store potable, black, and gray water for occupants, meeting capacity requirements as defined in the Water Storage Tank SRS.

issues.description: The reference to the Water Storage Tank SRS (an external document) is not detailed within the system documentation.
issues.suggested_fix: Clearly reference or include the Water Storage Tank SRS details to ensure traceability.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The water storage subsystem shall include a monitoring device that communicates water quality and contamination levels to the LSF.

issues.description: The usage of 'LSF' is unclear and inconsistent with other parts of the documentation.
issues.suggested_fix: Replace 'LSF' with 'Facility' to standardize terminology across requirements.

issues.description: No monitoring device attribute or method exists in WaterStorage for issuing contamination alerts.
issues.suggested_fix: Add a 'contaminationAlert' method or associate WaterStorage with the MonitoringSystem to support real-time alerts.

issues.description: Real-time monitoring and communication of water quality metrics are not explicitly modeled.
issues.suggested_fix: Enhance WaterStorage with a dedicated sensor or monitoring subcomponent that integrates with the ControlSystem.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: Process waste. The facility shall implement a disposal system for trash and waste that remains effective under extreme weather conditions.

issues.description: The requirement is vaguely worded and lacks specific performance metrics or detailed functionality.
issues.suggested_fix: Specify detailed performance criteria and explicitly reference the WasteManagementSystem in the requirement.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: Store non-perishable and perishable goods. Non-perishable items shall be stored in a clean, dry environment near the kitchen, while perishable goods require adequate refrigeration/freezing capacity for extended periods.

issues.description: The requirement does not clearly differentiate the storage locations or handling of perishable versus non-perishable items.
issues.suggested_fix: Extend the FoodStorage component to include distinct attributes for perishable and non-perishable storage or separate modules.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: Provide reasonable temperature conditions. The HVAC system shall be capable of maintaining livable conditions in extreme Antarctic cold for all living and sleeping quarters.

issues.description: The phrase 'livable conditions' is subjective and lacks measurable criteria.
issues.suggested_fix: Define explicit temperature ranges or performance criteria for the HVAC system.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: Monitor the health of critical equipment via a network of wired or wireless sensors covering systems such as power generation, HVAC, water purification, waste management, and drilling.

issues.description: The requirement references systems like power generation and drilling that are not present in the domain model.
issues.suggested_fix: Introduce the necessary domain components or adjust the requirement to align with existing model elements.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: Provide sufficient storage and maintenance space for expedition and drilling equipment, including heavy machinery, transport vehicles, and maintenance tools, with appropriate environmental controls.

issues.description: There is no explicit representation of dedicated maintenance spaces or environmental control in the EquipmentStorage component.
issues.suggested_fix: Enhance EquipmentStorage with additional attributes or methods to represent maintenance and environmental control requirements.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: Provide reliable communication with external teams, including US research labs and McMurdo Station, supporting email, data exchange, telephone, and videoconferencing.

issues.description: The domain model primarily covers data transmission and videoconferencing, neglecting other modalities such as email and telephone.
issues.suggested_fix: Either extend the CommunicationSystem to support these modalities or clarify the scope of supported communication types.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The LSF shall contain at least one radio for communication with McMurdo Station, which must operate on battery backup, feature a hand-crank function, and utilize solar power.

issues.description: The Radio class does not model the hand-crank functionality required by this requirement.
issues.suggested_fix: Add an attribute or method to capture hand-crank capability in the Radio class.

issues.description: The Radio class is missing an attribute for solar power capability.
issues.suggested_fix: Add a 'solarPowerCapable' boolean attribute to the Radio class.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The LSF shall contain at least one camera for video conferencing.

issues.description: There is no Camera class defined in the domain model to support video conferencing functionality.
issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a Camera class with appropriate attributes and methods.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The LSF shall contain at least three computers to support data transmission, with data storage maintained on an encrypted server.

issues.description: The domain model does not explicitly link encryption requirements to data storage.
issues.suggested_fix: Clarify encryption aspects in either the DataStorage or Computer classes.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The Research Team shall interface directly with a dedicated Windows PC and the radio system.

issues.description: The Computer class lacks an attribute to specify the operating system, thereby not representing a dedicated Windows PC.
issues.suggested_fix: Add an 'operatingSystem' attribute to the Computer class.

issues.description: There is no direct relationship between the ResearchTeam and the Radio in the domain model.
issues.suggested_fix: Establish an association between ResearchTeam and Radio.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The LSF shall be designed for transportability by LC-130 or C-130 Hercules aircraft to McMurdo Station.

issues.description: The domain model does not detail specific transportability criteria for aircraft.
issues.suggested_fix: Enhance the Facility component with detailed aircraft transportability specifications.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The LSF shall also be designed for transport by helicopter, truck, or sleds pulled by ground vehicles.

issues.description: Multi-modal transport requirements are not captured in the domain model.
issues.suggested_fix: Extend Facility transport attributes to include specifications for helicopter, truck, and sled transport.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: Provide accommodation with at least five beds and one mobile cot.

issues.description: The LivingQuarters component has bedCount and mobileCotCount attributes but lacks constraints enforcing the minimum numbers.
issues.suggested_fix: Add validation rules or constraints to ensure that bedCount >= 5 and mobileCotCount >= 1.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall include at least one shower.

issues.description: It is not clear whether the shower requirement applies to BathroomFacilities, LivingQuarters, or another specific area.
issues.suggested_fix: Clarify the intended location for showers within the domain model.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall include at least one toilet.

issues.description: The requirement does not specify which domain component should account for toilet facilities.
issues.suggested_fix: Clarify whether toilets are part of BathroomFacilities or LivingQuarters.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall have at least two sinks.

issues.description: It is unclear in which area the sinks are required.
issues.suggested_fix: Specify the intended location for sinks, such as in BathroomFacilities or LivingQuarters.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall have at least one set of AED defibrillators compliant with 29 CFR 1915.87 (OSHA Maritime).

issues.description: There is no mechanism in the SafetySystem to demonstrate compliance with the specified regulatory standard.
issues.suggested_fix: Annotate the SafetySystem with compliance attributes or documentation referencing 29 CFR 1915.87.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall include at least one table and five chairs.

issues.description: The domain model does not include any classes for furniture such as tables or chairs.
issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a Furniture class or separate Table and Chair classes to represent these items.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: Provide food storage with at least three refrigeration/freezer units.

issues.description: It is not clear if 'units' refers to separate FoodStorage instances or compartments within a single unit.
issues.suggested_fix: Clarify the food storage structure and update the FoodStorage component accordingly.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The refrigeration system shall provide at least 48 cubic feet of refrigeration space.

issues.description: The FoodStorage component does not specify measurement units or constraints for refrigeration capacity.
issues.suggested_fix: Define measurement units and introduce validation rules for the refrigerationCapacity attribute.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The freezer system shall provide at least 19.5 cubic feet of freezer space.

issues.description: Freezer capacity is not defined with units or enforced constraints in the domain model.
issues.suggested_fix: Specify measurement units and add validation for the freezerCapacity attribute.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall include at least a two-burner table-top stove.

issues.description: There is no representation of a stove or cooking appliance in the domain model.
issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a Stove class or extend the KitchenEquipment component to include stove functionality.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall monitor energy consumption using an electricity usage monitor.

issues.description: The EnergyManagementSystem does not explicitly model an electricity usage monitor.
issues.suggested_fix: Extend EnergyManagementSystem with detailed monitoring attributes or add a dedicated monitoring component.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall conserve energy by utilizing motion sensor switches and outlets.

issues.description: The domain model does not include components for motion sensor switches or smart outlets.
issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a MotionSensor class or augment EnergyManagementSystem with motion sensor attributes.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall store at least 150 lbs of food per week.

issues.description: The weekly requirement introduces a temporal element not captured by the static foodSupplyWeight attribute.
issues.suggested_fix: Clarify whether this requirement is about storage capacity or consumption rate and update the FoodStorage component accordingly.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The network shall support a minimum download speed of 12 Mbps.

issues.description: There is ambiguity between the download speed attributes in CommunicationSystem and NetworkSystem.
issues.suggested_fix: Standardize the representation of network speeds across the domain model.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The network shall support a minimum upload speed of 3 Mbps.

issues.description: The upload speed requirement is ambiguous due to varying attributes in the domain model.
issues.suggested_fix: Ensure consistent mapping of upload speed requirements within the CommunicationSystem.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility's database shall be capable of accessing and identifying all files within the storage system.

issues.description: There is no explicit mechanism for file indexing or identification in the DataStorage component.
issues.suggested_fix: Extend DataStorage to include file management capabilities or clarify the retrieval process.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall adhere to the 30-70-20 Pollution Prevention Policy.

issues.description: External regulatory policies like the Pollution Prevention Policy are not captured in the domain model.
issues.suggested_fix: Reference the policy in the Facility design documentation and link it to the Facility.checkCompliance functionality.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall adhere to the 30-50-75 Environmental Effects Abroad of Major Agency Actions.

issues.description: Environmental regulations are mentioned but not explicitly modeled.
issues.suggested_fix: Reference these regulations in the Facility design documentation.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall be designed in accordance with the environmental protection protocol of the Antarctic Treaty.

issues.description: Antarctic Treaty protocols are external requirements that are not captured in the domain model.
issues.suggested_fix: Reference the protocols in the Facility design documentation and ensure compliance logic is documented.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall comply with Title 21, Chapter I, Subchapters A, B, C, and D of the Federal Drug Administration.

issues.description: FDA compliance requirements are mentioned but not explicitly modeled.
issues.suggested_fix: Document FDA compliance within Facility.checkCompliance.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall be designed and built in accordance with applicable OSHA regulations, including fall protection, hazard communication, respiratory protection, scaffolding, ladder safety, control of hazardous energy, eye and face protection, and machinery guarding.

issues.description: Detailed OSHA-related safety features are not modeled within the SafetySystem.
issues.suggested_fix: Enhance SafetySystem with additional attributes or methods addressing OSHA requirements.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall be designed in accordance with the 2021 International Building Code.

issues.description: The domain model does not capture specific building code constraints.
issues.suggested_fix: Reference the International Building Code in the Facility design documentation.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall be designed in accordance with the 2021 Fire Code.

issues.description: Fire Code requirements are not explicitly captured beyond the existence of a FireSuppressionSystem.
issues.suggested_fix: Document fire code compliance in the design of the FireSuppressionSystem.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall be designed in accordance with the Fuel Gas Code.

issues.description: Specific Fuel Gas Code constraints are not modeled in FuelStorage.
issues.suggested_fix: Annotate FuelStorage with attributes that reflect the Fuel Gas Code requirements.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility's communication protocols shall comply with US Federal Code of Regulations – Title 47.

issues.description: Regulatory details for communication are not integrated in the domain model.
issues.suggested_fix: Incorporate regulatory compliance notes into the CommunicationSystem and ControlSystem documentation.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall generate potable water that meets EPA and WHO standards.

issues.description: While water quality functions exist, an explicit mapping to EPA and WHO standards is missing.
issues.suggested_fix: Annotate the WaterSystem’s compliance checks to reference EPA and WHO standards.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall meet MIL-STD-1366 Transportability Criteria.

issues.description: The Facility's transportStatus attribute does not capture specific MIL-STD-1366 criteria.
issues.suggested_fix: Enhance the transportStatus attribute with details specific to aircraft compatibility and standards.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall provide a network connection delivering an average WIFI speed of at least 25 Mbps throughout.

issues.description: This requirement conflicts with REQ-045 and REQ-046 regarding network speed specifications.
issues.suggested_fix: Reconcile the network speed requirements to eliminate the conflict and ensure consistency.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall notify occupants of any heating equipment failures within 1 minute.

issues.description: There is no defined mechanism in HVACSystem or ControlSystem to specify failure notification timing.
issues.suggested_fix: Add a 'failureNotificationDelay' attribute or method to capture the 1-minute notification requirement.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall notify occupants of any climate control system failures within 1 minute.

issues.description: The domain model lacks timing constraints for climate control failure notifications.
issues.suggested_fix: Integrate response-time attributes in HVACSystem or include timing parameters in facility alert methods.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall notify occupants of any water filtration equipment failures within 1 minute.

issues.description: The 1-minute notification requirement for water filtration failures is not represented in the domain model.
issues.suggested_fix: Incorporate timing constraints in the monitoring functions of WaterSystem or WaterFilter and link to Facility.notifyOccupants.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall remind occupants to replace water and air filters as per the manufacturer's instructions.

issues.description: There is no mechanism for sending maintenance reminders, and air filter functionality is missing from the HVACSystem.
issues.suggested_fix: Enhance the WaterFilter with reminder functionality and add an AirFilter component or attribute to HVACSystem.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall notify occupants of any fire or carbon monoxide equipment failures within 1 minute.

issues.description: No domain element exists for carbon monoxide detection.
issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a CarbonMonoxideDetector class with appropriate methods for detection and alerting.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall employ built-in tests (BIT) on power, heating, water filtration, electrical, and fire/CO systems.

issues.description: Built-in test capabilities for several subsystems (power generation, electrical systems, CO detection) are not modeled.
issues.suggested_fix: Extend existing components or introduce new ones with BIT functionality as required.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall test the power generation subsystem every 8 hours.

issues.description: No power generation subsystem is present in the domain model.
issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a PowerGenerationSystem class with appropriate testing methods.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall test the heating equipment every 8 hours.

issues.description: There is no scheduling mechanism in HVACSystem to support periodic self-testing.
issues.suggested_fix: Add timing or scheduling attributes to HVACSystem for periodic tests.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall test the water filtration equipment every 24 hours.

issues.description: WaterFilter lacks a scheduled test function.
issues.suggested_fix: Incorporate a scheduleTest method or timing attribute in WaterFilter or WaterSystem.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall test the electrical equipment every 8 hours.

issues.description: There is no electrical system modeled to support this testing requirement.
issues.suggested_fix: Introduce an ElectricalSystem class with relevant test methods.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall test the fire detecting equipment every hour.

issues.description: It is unclear whether fire detection is solely managed by the existing FireSuppressionSystem or requires a separate component.
issues.suggested_fix: Clarify if additional fire detection capabilities are needed or augment FireSuppressionSystem accordingly.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall test the carbon monoxide detecting equipment every hour.

issues.description: No domain model element exists for carbon monoxide detection testing.
issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a CarbonMonoxideDetector class or integrate CO detection into an existing system.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: Medical supplies shall be restocked weekly as needed.

issues.description: Restocking functionality in the MedicalEquipment component is limited to tracking dates with no process for weekly restocking.
issues.suggested_fix: Add methods or scheduling attributes to MedicalEquipment to handle restocking procedures.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: Software and firmware updates shall not interrupt critical system functions.

issues.description: There is no modeled mechanism for executing software/firmware updates without interruption.
issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a SoftwareUpdateProcess component or extend ControlSystem to manage updates without interruption.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: Software and firmware updates shall be executed manually.

issues.description: Manual execution of updates is not represented in the domain model.
issues.suggested_fix: Augment the ControlSystem to specify and manage manual update processes.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: All control panels shall be locked.

issues.description: Control panels are referenced but not modeled in the system.
issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a ControlPanel class with locking and security attributes.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: Control panels shall be accessible only from within the facility.

issues.description: Physical access restrictions for control panels are not captured in the domain model.
issues.suggested_fix: Enhance the ControlPanel or ControlSystem components with access control attributes.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall notify occupants of routine maintenance for drilling or ice core analysis equipment via a monitoring device.

issues.description: Drilling equipment referenced in this requirement is not present in the domain model.
issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a DrillEquipment class or extend EquipmentStorage to explicitly include drilling equipment.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The drilling equipment storage unit shall house replacement hardware.

issues.description: The concept of 'replacement hardware' is not defined within EquipmentStorage.
issues.suggested_fix: Add attributes or methods to EquipmentStorage for managing replacement hardware.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall be designed using Commercial Off-The-Shelf (COTS) technology wherever possible.

issues.description: There is no representation of COTS components in the current domain model.
issues.suggested_fix: Document the use of COTS in the design documentation or add a component representing COTS standards.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The control system shall be operable via a stand-alone smart device (e.g., tablet) or from a dedicated control panel.

issues.description: Smart device integration is not explicitly modeled within the ControlSystem.
issues.suggested_fix: Extend the ControlSystem to include interfaces and methods for smart device connectivity.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The crew shall monitor the control system using smart devices.

issues.description: The domain model lacks features to support smart device–based monitoring of the ControlSystem.
issues.suggested_fix: Enhance the ControlSystem to incorporate smart device monitoring capabilities.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The crew shall be able to control the facility via smart devices.

issues.description: Remote control via smart devices is not supported in the current domain model.
issues.suggested_fix: Improve the ControlSystem to provide remote control functionalities via smart devices.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The monitoring system shall include a fire-suppression system.

issues.description: Although the domain model associates MonitoringSystem with FireSuppressionSystem, the fire suppression component is not modeled as an integral part of the monitoring system.
issues.suggested_fix: Clarify the relationship by either adjusting the association or modifying the requirement to reflect the model.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The potable water system shall feature a visible display of pH level.

issues.description: The mechanism for a 'visible display' (e.g., GUI or physical display) is not clearly specified.
issues.suggested_fix: Clarify the intended display technology in the WaterSystem design.

missing_requirements.description: Missing requirement for continuous monitoring, logging, and reporting of the facility's structural integrity.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The facility shall continuously monitor, log, and report its structural integrity rating. If the rating falls below a predefined safe threshold (e.g., 85% of design specifications), the system shall trigger alerts to occupants and maintenance personnel and suspend non-critical operations until repairs are initiated.
missing_requirements.rationale: Continuous structural integrity monitoring is vital for occupant safety and operational readiness in extreme conditions.

missing_requirements.description: No requirement specifies security authentication and access control levels.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The security system shall implement role-based access control with at least three distinct access levels (e.g., Administrator, Scientist, Maintenance), requiring authentication for all critical system controls.
missing_requirements.rationale: A robust security mechanism is crucial for protecting sensitive operations in a remote and high-risk environment.

missing_requirements.description: Missing requirements for data backup and recovery.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The facility shall perform automated daily backups of all research data and system logs, and provide a reliable mechanism to restore data in case of corruption or loss.
missing_requirements.rationale: Regular backups safeguard critical research data against accidental loss or corruption.

missing_requirements.description: No requirement exists for emergency procedures and system state transitions.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The facility shall support an emergency mode that automatically prioritizes life support systems and conserves energy during critical failures or resource shortages.
missing_requirements.rationale: Defined emergency procedures are necessary to ensure occupant safety during operational failures.

missing_requirements.description: No requirement specifies system integration testing prior to deployment.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The facility shall undergo comprehensive system integration testing before deployment, verifying that all subsystems operate together correctly under simulated conditions.
missing_requirements.rationale: Integration testing prevents unforeseen failures in operational scenarios.

missing_requirements.description: Missing requirement for documented transport preparation procedures.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The facility shall include documented procedures for preparing all systems for transport, including securing equipment, draining water systems, and orderly shutdowns.
missing_requirements.rationale: Proper transport preparation ensures safe and efficient relocation in remote areas.

missing_requirements.description: No requirement details video conferencing session capabilities and capacity.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The communication system shall support video conferencing with at least 5 simultaneous participants at a minimum resolution of 720p, and include fallback modes for low-bandwidth conditions.
missing_requirements.rationale: Enhanced video conferencing is critical for effective collaboration with external experts.

missing_requirements.description: Missing requirement for power management during failures.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The facility shall implement a power management system that automatically prioritizes critical systems (e.g., HVAC, water, communications) during power shortages or failures.
missing_requirements.rationale: Effective power management ensures uninterrupted operation during power disruptions.

missing_requirements.description: No requirement for scheduling and tracking facility maintenance.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The facility shall maintain an automated maintenance schedule for all subsystems, including reminders for routine tasks based on manufacturer guidelines and usage patterns.
missing_requirements.rationale: Regular maintenance scheduling minimizes downtime and ensures long-term system reliability.

missing_requirements.description: Missing requirement for generating regular compliance reports.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The facility shall generate monthly compliance reports that document adherence to applicable regulations, with automatic flagging of any violations.
missing_requirements.rationale: Regular compliance reporting ensures that all regulatory obligations are met.

missing_requirements.description: No requirement specifies water quality monitoring thresholds.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The water system shall continuously monitor water quality and alert occupants when parameters fall outside safe thresholds as defined by EPA and WHO standards.
missing_requirements.rationale: Defining water quality thresholds is essential for ensuring drinking water safety.

missing_requirements.description: Missing requirement for system scalability to accommodate increased occupancy.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The facility systems shall be designed to accommodate up to 8 occupants with minimal reconfiguration, despite a baseline of 5 scientists.
missing_requirements.rationale: Scalability ensures the facility can support temporary increases in occupancy if needed.

missing_requirements.description: No requirement specifies logging and analysis of sensor data.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The monitoring system shall log sensor data at configurable intervals (minimum once per minute) and provide analytical tools for trend analysis and anomaly detection.
missing_requirements.rationale: Accurate sensor data logging is essential for predictive maintenance and troubleshooting.

missing_requirements.description: Missing requirement for comprehensive user training and documentation.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The facility shall provide comprehensive user documentation and training materials for all systems, including prominently displayed emergency procedure guides.
missing_requirements.rationale: Effective training and documentation are critical for proper system operation and maintenance.

missing_requirements.description: No requirement outlines water filter maintenance scheduling and logging.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The water system shall automatically schedule water filter maintenance based on manufacturer intervals, usage hours, and water quality metrics; it shall log the last maintenance date and notify the Mission Supervisor 24 hours in advance.
missing_requirements.rationale: Proactive filter maintenance is critical for continuous water quality compliance.

missing_requirements.description: The HVAC system's self-diagnostic capability is not explicitly mandated.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The HVAC system shall perform a self-diagnostic test at startup and every 8 hours thereafter, log the results, and immediately notify maintenance personnel if anomalies are detected.
missing_requirements.rationale: Regular self-diagnostics ensure prompt detection and resolution of HVAC issues.

missing_requirements.description: No requirement specifies detailed inventory management for equipment storage.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The equipment storage system shall track and update the inventory of all stored expedition and drilling equipment in real time, and generate a daily inventory report accessible via the control system.
missing_requirements.rationale: Effective inventory management is essential for mission readiness and equipment planning.

missing_requirements.description: The behavior of sensors, including diagnostic reporting and update intervals, is not fully specified.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: Each sensor shall execute diagnostic tests at intervals specified by its updateInterval and report any anomalies to the MonitoringSystem within 60 seconds.
missing_requirements.rationale: Clear sensor diagnostic specifications are vital for early fault detection.

missing_requirements.description: No requirement addresses the automatic execution and logging of built-in tests in the control system.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The control system shall automatically run a built-in test at the start of each operational cycle, log the results, and alert administrators if issues are detected.
missing_requirements.rationale: Automated testing improves system reliability through early fault detection.

missing_requirements.description: No explicit requirement for continuous monitoring of medical equipment supply levels beyond the restocking schedule.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The medical equipment system shall continuously monitor supply levels and trigger alerts if levels fall below a predefined threshold (e.g., 20% capacity) in addition to regular restocking protocols.
missing_requirements.rationale: Continuous monitoring of medical supplies is critical for emergency readiness.

missing_requirements.description: Monitoring of fuel levels in the fuel storage system beyond routine compliance checks is not specified.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The fuel storage system shall continuously monitor fuel levels in real time and generate alerts when levels fall outside predetermined safety thresholds, ensuring compliance with EPA SPCC guidelines.
missing_requirements.rationale: Real-time fuel monitoring is essential for maintaining safe power generation and preventing hazardous conditions.

missing_requirements.description: No requirement mandates continuous performance monitoring and threshold-based alerting for the network system.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The network system shall continuously monitor key performance metrics (e.g., WiFi speed, connection stability) and trigger an alert if thresholds are breached.
missing_requirements.rationale: Consistent network performance is crucial for communication in an isolated facility.

missing_requirements.description: The requirements do not include functionality for indexing and searching stored data.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The data storage system shall maintain a real-time searchable index of all stored files and provide a dedicated query interface for retrieval by unique identifiers or metadata.
missing_requirements.rationale: Efficient data retrieval supports operational efficiency and rapid access to critical information.

missing_requirements.description: Missing requirement for handling fuel storage compliance checks.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The facility shall perform automated compliance checks on fuel storage every 24 hours and generate a report accessible to the Mission Supervisor.
missing_requirements.rationale: Regular compliance checks ensure fuel storage meets safety and environmental regulations.

missing_requirements.description: Missing requirement for fire suppression system activation conditions.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The fire suppression system shall automatically activate when smoke or excessive heat is detected in any part of the facility and notify both occupants and an external control center (e.g., McMurdo Station).
missing_requirements.rationale: Immediate activation minimizes damage and ensures occupant safety in an isolated environment.

missing_requirements.description: No requirement specifies sensor data validation before processing.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The monitoring system shall validate sensor data for accuracy and consistency before processing, and flag any invalid data for manual review.
missing_requirements.rationale: Reliable sensor data is fundamental for correct system monitoring and decision-making.

missing_requirements.description: Missing requirement for logging temperature in ice core storage systems.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The ice core storage system shall log temperature readings every hour and store the data in encrypted storage for at least one year.
missing_requirements.rationale: Continuous temperature logging is essential to preserve the integrity of ice cores critical for climate research.

missing_requirements.description: Missing requirement for secure access to control system commands.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: All commands executed via the control system shall require dual authentication from at least two authorized personnel.
missing_requirements.rationale: Dual authentication helps prevent unauthorized access and ensures that critical commands are executed securely.

missing_requirements.description: Missing requirement for waste management system capacity alerts.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The waste management system shall alert the Mission Supervisor when waste capacity reaches 80% of total capacity.
missing_requirements.rationale: Early alerts for waste capacity help prevent overfilling and ensure timely waste processing.

missing_requirements.description: Missing requirement for backup power source switching logic in communication systems.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The radio system shall automatically switch to battery backup when primary power fails and notify the control system of the power source change.
missing_requirements.rationale: Automatic switching ensures uninterrupted communication during power failures.

missing_requirements.description: Missing requirement for the frequency of cloud storage synchronization.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The cloud storage system shall synchronize data with local storage every 6 hours and allow manual override for urgent updates.
missing_requirements.rationale: Regular synchronization is necessary to maintain data consistency between local and cloud storage.

missing_requirements.description: Missing requirement for HVAC system failure fallback mechanisms.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The HVAC system shall activate backup heating units if the primary system fails to maintain the target temperature for more than 10 minutes.
missing_requirements.rationale: Backup heating is essential to protect occupants from dangerous temperature drops in extreme conditions.

missing_requirements.description: Missing requirement for environmental control thresholds in equipment storage.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The equipment storage system shall maintain environmental controls within ±5°F of the target temperature and alert the Mission Supervisor if deviations persist for more than 30 minutes.
missing_requirements.rationale: Stable environmental conditions are vital to preserve sensitive equipment.

missing_requirements.description: Missing requirement for food storage temperature logging.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The food storage system shall log temperature readings every 2 hours and generate a weekly compliance report accessible to the Mission Supervisor.
missing_requirements.rationale: Regular temperature logging is critical for food safety compliance and spoilage prevention.

domain_model_issues.description: A Camera class is required for video conferencing but is missing from the domain model.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Add a Camera class with appropriate attributes (e.g., resolution, type) and methods (e.g., startVideoStream, captureImage).

domain_model_issues.description: Multiple requirements reference crew interactions, yet there is no Crew class in the domain model.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a Crew class with attributes for member details and methods for interactions with facility systems.

domain_model_issues.description: The Radio class lacks an attribute to represent the hand-crank function required in REQ-014.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Add a boolean attribute 'handCrankFunction' to the Radio class.

domain_model_issues.description: There is no method to support hand-crank functionality in the Radio class.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a method 'useHandCrank()' in the Radio class.

domain_model_issues.description: The Radio class is missing an attribute to indicate solar power usage, as required in REQ-014.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Add a 'solarPowerCapable' boolean attribute to the Radio class.

domain_model_issues.description: To represent a dedicated Windows PC for REQ-018, an operating system attribute is needed in the Computer class.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Add an 'operatingSystem' attribute to the Computer class.

domain_model_issues.description: REQ-018 requires a direct interface between ResearchTeam and Radio, but no such relationship exists in the domain model.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Establish an association relationship between the ResearchTeam and Radio classes.

domain_model_issues.description: The domain model lacks a MotionSensor class needed for energy conservation as specified in REQ-039.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a MotionSensor class, either as a standalone element or as an extension of the Sensor class.

domain_model_issues.description: Drill equipment referenced in multiple requirements (REQ-009, REQ-080, REQ-081) is not present in the domain model.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Add a DrillEquipment class with attributes and methods for maintenance tracking.

domain_model_issues.description: Requirements REQ-083, REQ-084, and REQ-085 call for smart device interfaces, yet the domain model does not include a SmartDevice class.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a SmartDevice class with attributes for device type and connectivity methods.

domain_model_issues.description: The capability for water recycling is referenced in REQ-002 and REQ-003 but is not explicitly modeled in WaterSystem.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Add an attribute 'waterRecyclingCapability' to the WaterSystem class.

domain_model_issues.description: Furnishings such as tables and chairs are required by REQ-032 but are not represented in the domain model.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Add a 'furnishings' attribute to CommonArea or create a separate Furniture class.

domain_model_issues.description: There is no method in WaterSystem to handle water filtering as specified in REQ-002.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Add a 'filterWater()' method to the WaterSystem class to process water filtering according to standards.

domain_model_issues.description: The WaterFilter class lacks attributes and methods for issuing maintenance alerts, as required by REQ-003.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Add a 'maintenanceAlert' attribute and an 'alertMaintenance()' method to WaterFilter.

domain_model_issues.description: MonitoringSystem does not have explicit associations with WaterFilter and WaterStorage for alert purposes.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Add associations between MonitoringSystem and the water components with appropriate alert methods.

domain_model_issues.description: The Facility class's windResistance attribute does not enforce the required minimum of 250 mph.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Add a constraint such as 'windResistance >= 250' in the Facility class.

domain_model_issues.description: There is no direct relationship between MonitoringSystem and WaterSystem to support water quality monitoring.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Establish an association between MonitoringSystem and WaterSystem.

domain_model_issues.description: ControlSystem lacks methods for timed failure notifications (e.g., for heating, climate control, water filtration).
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Add methods with appropriate timing parameters to ControlSystem to support failure notifications.

domain_model_issues.description: No Table class is defined, despite the requirement for a table in REQ-032.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a Table class to represent table furniture in the domain model.

domain_model_issues.description: No Chair class exists in the domain model though chairs are required by REQ-032.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Add a Chair class or include chairs as part of a generic Furniture component.

domain_model_issues.description: The domain model does not include a Stove component required by REQ-036.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a Stove class or extend KitchenEquipment to incorporate stove functionality.

domain_model_issues.description: Air filters are not represented, yet are required for maintenance reminders in REQ-065.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Introduce an AirFilter class or add air filter attributes to the HVACSystem.

domain_model_issues.description: No component exists to detect carbon monoxide, as required by REQ-066 and REQ-073.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a CarbonMonoxideDetector class with detection and alert methods.

domain_model_issues.description: The domain model lacks a power generation subsystem, which is referenced in REQ-009 and REQ-068.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Add a PowerGenerationSystem class with testing and monitoring capabilities.

domain_model_issues.description: There is no representation of an electrical system to support REQ-071.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Introduce an ElectricalSystem class with appropriate test methods.

domain_model_issues.description: Software/firmware update processes are not modeled, despite requirements in REQ-075 and REQ-076.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a SoftwareUpdateProcess component or extend the ControlSystem to manage updates.

domain_model_issues.description: Control panels referenced in REQ-078 and REQ-079 are not defined in the domain model.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a ControlPanel class with attributes for locking and access control.

domain_model_issues.description: The transportStatus attribute in Facility does not capture detailed multimodal transport criteria (e.g., aircraft, helicopter, ground vehicle compatibility).
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Enhance transportStatus with additional attributes or specify detailed transportability criteria.

domain_model_issues.description: There is no explicit support for smart device integration in the domain model, despite multiple requirements referencing smart devices.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Extend the ControlSystem to include smart device connectivity or add a dedicated SmartDevice interface component.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: Provide water for drinking and hygiene. The facility shall have a water purification system sufficient for both drinking and cooking, as well as for bathing, laundry, and restroom usage.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: Provide water for drinking and hygiene. The facility shall have a water purification system capable of producing at least [X] gallons per day of potable water, sufficient for both drinking and cooking, as well as for bathing, laundry, and restroom usage for [Y] occupants.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement lacks specific capacity metrics and performance criteria. It doesn't specify how much water is needed or for how many people, making it difficult to verify implementation.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The water recycling subsystem shall filter water in accordance with safety water standards defined by regulatory bodies.
missing_elements: Measurable filtration performance or quality targets
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The water recycling subsystem shall filter water in accordance with safety water standards defined by EPA and WHO, meeting or exceeding all applicable potable water quality requirements as verified through regular water quality testing.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement references unspecified 'regulatory bodies' without naming them or providing specific standards to be met. It also lacks information on how compliance will be verified.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The water recycling subsystem shall include a monitoring device that alerts the LSF when the filtering system requires change or maintenance, with data retrieved via a dedicated application.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The water recycling subsystem shall include a monitoring device that alerts the LSF when the filtering system requires change or maintenance, with alerts triggered at least [X] days before critical failure, delivered through both visual indicators and the dedicated application interface.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify when alerts should be triggered (thresholds) or the method of alert delivery (visual, audible, etc.), which are important for implementation.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The water storage subsystem shall store potable, black, and gray water for occupants, meeting capacity requirements as defined in the Water Storage Tank SRS.
missing_elements: Explicit capacity numbers within the requirement
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The water storage subsystem shall store potable, black, and gray water for occupants, with minimum capacities of [X] gallons for potable water, [Y] gallons for gray water, and [Z] gallons for black water, as detailed in the Water Storage Tank SRS document [document number/version].
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement references an external document without providing any actual capacity values in this requirement. This creates dependency issues if the referenced document changes or is unavailable.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The water storage subsystem shall include a monitoring device that communicates water quality and contamination levels to the LSF.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The water storage subsystem shall include a monitoring device that communicates water quality and contamination levels to the LSF control system at least hourly, measuring pH, bacterial content, and chemical contaminants, with data accessible through the facility control interface.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement lacks specifics about which water quality parameters should be monitored, how frequently, and how the information should be communicated to users.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: Process waste. The facility shall implement a disposal system for trash and waste that remains effective under extreme weather conditions.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: Process waste. The facility shall implement a disposal system for organic, recyclable, and hazardous waste that remains effective under extreme weather conditions including temperatures down to -40°F and wind speeds up to 250 mph, with capacity to process at least [X] pounds of waste per week.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement is very general, lacking specifics about types of waste, disposal methods, capacity needs, and what constitutes 'extreme weather conditions'.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: Store non-perishable and perishable goods. Non-perishable items shall be stored in a clean, dry environment near the kitchen, while perishable goods require adequate refrigeration/freezing capacity for extended periods.
missing_elements: Defined environmental conditions for perishable storage
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: Store non-perishable and perishable goods. Non-perishable items shall be stored in a clean, dry environment near the kitchen with at least [X] cubic feet of storage space, while perishable goods require refrigeration/freezing capacity of at least [Y] cubic feet capable of maintaining temperatures between [Z1]°F and [Z2]°F for periods of up to [W] months.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement lacks specific capacity requirements, temperature specifications for refrigeration/freezing, and doesn't define what constitutes 'extended periods'.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: Provide reasonable temperature conditions. The HVAC system shall be capable of maintaining livable conditions in extreme Antarctic cold for all living and sleeping quarters.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: Provide controlled temperature conditions. The HVAC system shall be capable of maintaining interior temperatures between 65°F and 75°F in all living and sleeping quarters when exterior temperatures range from -40°F to 80°F, with relative humidity maintained between 30% and 60%.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement uses subjective terms ('reasonable', 'livable') without defining measurable criteria. It lacks specific temperature ranges for both interior conditions and exterior design conditions.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: Monitor the health of critical equipment via a network of wired or wireless sensors covering systems such as power generation, HVAC, water purification, waste management, and drilling.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: Monitor the health of critical equipment via a network of wired or wireless sensors covering systems such as power generation, HVAC, water purification, waste management, and drilling, with data collected at least every 15 minutes, alerts triggered when parameters deviate by more than 10% from normal operating ranges, and data stored for a minimum of 30 days.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify how frequently monitoring should occur, what constitutes abnormal conditions requiring alerts, or how long monitoring data should be retained.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: Provide sufficient storage and maintenance space for expedition and drilling equipment, including heavy machinery, transport vehicles, and maintenance tools, with appropriate environmental controls.
missing_elements: specific storage capacity and environmental controls
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: Provide at least [X] square feet of storage and maintenance space for expedition and drilling equipment, including heavy machinery, transport vehicles, and maintenance tools, with environmental controls maintaining temperature between [Y]°F and [Z]°F and humidity below [W]%, with doorways at least [V] feet wide to accommodate the largest equipment.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement uses the subjective term 'sufficient' without specifying dimensions. It also mentions 'appropriate environmental controls' without defining parameters.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: Store ice cores. The facility shall be capable of simultaneously storing 20 ice cores at temperatures maintained between -40°F and 20°F.

requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The facility shall test the water filtration equipment every 24 hours, verifying flow rates, pressure differentials, and basic water quality parameters, with tests failing if flow drops below 75% of rated capacity or if contaminants exceed safe thresholds, and results logged with alerts for any failures.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement specifies frequency but doesn't define what should be tested, what constitutes a failure, or how results should be reported.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall test the electrical equipment every 8 hours.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The facility shall test the electrical equipment (including circuit breakers, GFCIs, surge protectors, and backup systems) every 8 hours, verifying proper function, load capacity, and safety features, with tests failing if any device doesn't respond appropriately or if electrical parameters deviate more than 10% from nominal values, and results logged with alerts for any failures.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify which electrical equipment should be tested, what parameters should be tested, what constitutes a failure, or how results should be reported.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall test the fire detecting equipment every hour.
missing_elements: Clarification if testing is automatic or manual
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The facility shall test the fire detecting equipment every hour, verifying sensor response, alarm function, and power status, with tests failing if any detector doesn't respond to electronic test signals or if battery levels fall below 50%, and results logged with immediate alerts for any failures.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement specifies frequency but doesn't define what should be tested, what constitutes a failure, or how results should be reported.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall test the carbon monoxide detecting equipment every hour.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The facility shall test the carbon monoxide detecting equipment every hour, verifying sensor response, alarm function, and power status, with tests failing if any detector doesn't respond to electronic test signals or if battery levels fall below 50%, and results logged with immediate alerts for any failures.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement specifies frequency but doesn't define what should be tested, what constitutes a failure, or how results should be reported.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: Medical supplies shall be restocked weekly as needed.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: Medical supplies (including bandages, antiseptics, pain relievers, and emergency medications) shall be restocked weekly as needed, maintaining minimum inventory levels as specified in the Medical Supply Inventory List, with restocking verified and documented by designated personnel.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify which supplies should be restocked, what minimum levels should be maintained, or how restocking should be verified.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: Software and firmware updates shall not interrupt critical system functions.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: Software and firmware updates shall not interrupt critical system functions (including HVAC, water, power, and safety systems) during installation, requiring staged deployment with rollback capability, and full testing in a non-production environment before implementation.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't define which systems are critical, what procedures should be followed for updates, or how updates should be tested before deployment.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: Software and firmware updates shall be executed manually.
missing_elements: Conditions or exceptions for manual versus automated updates
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: Software and firmware updates shall be executed manually by authorized personnel only, following documented change management procedures including pre-update testing, approval, scheduled implementation, and post-update verification.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify who can perform updates, what procedures should be followed, or how updates should be tested and verified.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility's control system shall be password protected.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The facility's control system shall be password protected, requiring complex passwords (minimum 12 characters with mixed case, numbers, and symbols), multi-factor authentication for critical functions, role-based access levels, and formal account management procedures including quarterly password changes.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify password complexity requirements, additional authentication methods, different access levels, or account management procedures.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: All control panels shall be locked.
missing_elements: Specification of locking mechanisms or standards
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: All control panels shall be locked with keyed or electronic locks, with access restricted to authorized personnel through an access control system, and unauthorized access attempts logged and reported to facility management.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify what type of locks should be used, how access should be controlled, or whether access attempts should be monitored.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: Control panels shall be accessible only from within the facility.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: Control panels shall be accessible only from within the facility, located in secured areas away from public access points, with emergency access provisions for authorized personnel during facility lockdown situations.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify where within the facility the panels should be located or how emergency access would be handled.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall notify occupants of routine maintenance for drilling or ice core analysis equipment via a monitoring device.
missing_elements: Details on the monitoring device specifications
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The facility shall notify occupants of routine maintenance for drilling or ice core analysis equipment via a monitoring device at least 48 hours in advance, through visual displays and mobile alerts, with the ability to schedule and confirm maintenance activities through the system interface.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify when notifications should be sent, what methods should be used, or how maintenance should be scheduled.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The drilling equipment storage unit shall house replacement hardware.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The drilling equipment storage unit shall house replacement hardware including drill bits, motors, power supplies, and connection components, maintaining minimum quantities as specified in the Equipment Inventory List, organized in a clearly labeled storage system with inventory tracking.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify what replacement hardware should be stored, in what quantities, or how it should be organized and tracked.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall be designed using Commercial Off-The-Shelf (COTS) technology wherever possible.
missing_elements: Criteria for evaluating when COTS is acceptable
Exceptions or performance requirements for non-COTS components
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The facility shall be designed using Commercial Off-The-Shelf (COTS) technology wherever possible, with custom solutions permitted only when COTS options cannot meet critical requirements, ensuring compatibility between all integrated systems, and requiring vendor support agreements for all major components.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify when exceptions are allowed, how compatibility between different COTS systems should be handled, or vendor support requirements.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The control system shall be operable via a stand-alone smart device (e.g., tablet) or from a dedicated control panel.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The control system shall be operable via a stand-alone smart device (e.g., tablet running iOS 14+ or Android 10+) or from a dedicated control panel, with a consistent user interface across both platforms, secured through encryption and authentication, and capable of full system control within three levels of navigation.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify device requirements, interface design considerations, or security requirements for remote operation.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The crew shall monitor the control system using smart devices.
missing_elements: Specifics of monitoring tasks and user interface requirements
Notification or alert mechanisms on the smart devices
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The crew shall monitor the control system using smart devices (tablets or smartphones running iOS 14+ or Android 10+), with real-time status dashboards, configurable alerts and notifications, and secure access requiring multi-factor authentication.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify device requirements, what should be monitored, notification capabilities, or security requirements.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The crew shall be able to control the facility via smart devices.
missing_elements: Security and responsiveness requirements for remote control
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The crew shall be able to control the facility via smart devices (tablets or smartphones running iOS 14+ or Android 10+), with appropriate role-based access restrictions, two-factor authentication for critical operations, and encrypted communications, limited to authorized personnel only.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify device requirements, what functions can be controlled, authorization levels, or security requirements.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The monitoring system shall include a fire-suppression system.
missing_elements: Operational performance criteria for the suppression system
Integration details between monitoring and fire-suppression systems
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The monitoring system shall include a fire-suppression system using [specific agent] covering all living, storage, and equipment areas, automatically activated by smoke or heat detection exceeding [threshold values], with manual override capability, and maintained according to NFPA requirements with quarterly inspections.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify the type of suppression system, where it should be installed, when it should activate, or how it should be maintained.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The potable water system shall feature a visible display of pH level.
missing_elements: Update frequency and display technology details
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: The potable water system shall feature a visible display of pH level located near the primary water access point, updating readings at least every 15 minutes, with visual and audible alerts when pH falls outside the 6.5-8.5 range.
requirement_completeness.rationale: The requirement doesn't specify where the display should be located, how frequently it should update, or what thresholds should trigger alerts.

reasoning.domain_model: The consensus domain model integrates key classes from all three source models by merging overlapping subsystems and refining attributes, methods, and relationships. The Facility class combines structural, operational, and environmental attributes from all models. Water and HVAC systems are unified to include purification, recycling, and climate control functionalities. Storage systems are abstracted into a generic StorageSystem with specialized subclasses (FoodStorage, EquipmentStorage, IceCoreStorage) to capture diverse storage requirements. Communication and control components are enhanced by incorporating elements from diverse models, and additional subsystems (MonitoringSystem, SecuritySystem, FireSuppressionSystem, MedicalEquipment, CommonArea, KitchenEquipment, FuelStorage) are included to present a complete facility view. Conflicts were resolved by choosing the most detailed and representative attributes and methods from each model, resulting in a coherent, comprehensive domain model.
reasoning.analysis: This consensus analysis was created by merging the findings from multiple requirement analyses. For requirement issues, duplicate and similar observations were combined while preserving unique insights such as ambiguous terminology, missing compliance information, and inconsistencies between the requirements and the domain model. Missing requirements were consolidated from the source analyses, ensuring that critical aspects—such as structural integrity monitoring, security authentication, data backup, emergency procedures, and testing protocols—are captured. Domain model issues were aggregated to highlight missing or incomplete components (e.g., Camera, Crew, Radio attributes, MotionSensor, and others) necessary for aligning the domain model with the stated requirements. This comprehensive overview highlights the most important areas needing attention and guides subsequent refinements.
